views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11, and 12

Adds a heart indicator for songs you've "loved" in Apple Music!

Currently only supports songs in playlists and album lists.

Configure options from Settings

~ Performance improvements & bug fixes ------------------- 0.3: New pro features: + Double-tap to like (beta - doesn't yet sync to iCloud) + Show iTunes rating (like i See Stars III) Introducing MusicLove Pro ($1.99)!
(Upgrade in Settings)

Pro features:
+ New icon for disliked songs
+ Color customization for like & dislike icons

Coming soon: Like lists, like filtering, and more!


~ Bug fix for dark mode tweak compatibility in the "Up Next" list


~ Fixed a bug with the last update overlapping album art
~ Bug fixes on iPad


~ Bug fixes for dark mode tweaks
~ Automatic dark mode compatibility


+ New module in the Settings app
~ Bug fixes

** If you use a dark mode tweak like DarkSounds or Noctis, please enable dark mode in settings**
+ Added heart indicator to song in artist list

0.0.2:
+ Added heart indicator to song in "All Songs"
+ Added heart indicator to song in Artist -> All Songs
~ Bug fixes
